item.title: CVE-2021-27779|2024-09-17T00:11:31.808Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20versionvault%20express
item.description: VersionVault Express exposes sensitive information that an attacker can use to impersonate the server or eavesdrop on communications with the server.
